articles.title: Our galaxy likely has hundreds of millions of potentially habitable planets, says study - The Indian Express

articles.content: Our sun, while familiar to us, is quite a rarity in the Milky Way where it dwells. The most common stars in the galaxy have less than half the mass of the Sun at most and are a lot smaller and cooler… [+2618 chars]
